title: Wait For Us (
lyrics:
Time waits for no one, The reason why we run
Hit me up in a moment, I'm ready to burn
Naui 10nyeon jeon-i eojewa gatne
Saeng-gagbodado oneul-eun salmanhae
Chochimboda deo ppaleun nae saeng-gag-eun

Gyeomson-eul moleuji eoje boda deo jamanhae

Yeojeonhi yeogie, yeojeonhi All in

Yeojeonhi eoulliji, yeojeonhi Goal in

Dab-eun sigan-igo, sigan-eun dab-iji

Sigan-eun don-igo, mang-gag-eun yag-iji

Sangcheo namgigo, chueog-eul namgiji

That's the knowledge of a moment of Genesis

Sal-ayagessji, sal-anamgessji, sal-agagessji

I'm the greatest, I ain't afraid to death because I've been ready

Sauce on these denim, It treats you the worst, it's venom

Ulineun ttaelon uliui ttaeleul nohchiji, seulpeugedo



I geim-eun ulil gidalijianh-a nan nae gihoeleul jab-aya hae

Geuleon sig-eulo nan yeogikkaji wassji I'm fuckin proud of that

Speed up in my top down imi neom-eowassji nae da-eum jang

Oneuldo saeloun nal-eun balg-a dasi pyeolchyeoyaji nae sangsang

Yea I need some fresh vibes jinagan geosdeul-eun pass it by

Dulyeoum ttawin eobs-eo gyesog gane nan don-eul beolji yeah maesungan

Don't stop what u doin now niga neoui salm-ui ju-in now

Time waits for no one mangseol-iji ma just do it now

Sigan-eun ppaleuge dalliji tto hanjang neom-eoga dallyeog-i

Uliui jeolm-eum-eun neomuna jjalb-a pedal-eul deo ssege balb-a yea

Nae cha-e ollata yea deo na-eun nal-eul hyanghae yea

We never switch sides baby do our shit til we die yea
